name: Harvest Of The 10
description:
Abilities stack.

example: Sword HT (10) + Character (HT) = 15 HT when attacking.

HT = Hit Chance

Dmg = damage

"Red" = health

"Blue" = Character Hit chance

"Grey" = Character Damage

Credits:

Game: Kussa

Art: waifu diffusion.

Sound effects: https://mixkit.co/

Music: 

🎵 Song: 'Dragon Castle' by Makai Symphony https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8cn3OdeqYhyhNUyrMxOQKQ
